title: PersistenceCore v13.0.0
summary:
# Persistence Core-1 v13.0.0 Upgrade

This proposal is to do a software upgrade to the v13.0.0 software tag of the Persistence codebase at [23794500](https://www.mintscan.io/persistence/block/23794500) block height. Block times have high variance, so please monitor the chain for precise time.

## Scope of the upgrade:

1. Updates to cosmos-sdk v0.50.14-lsm, ibc-go v10.1.1, wasmd v0.55.1, wasmvm v2.2.4, and corresponding libraries.

2. Prepares persistenceCore for alignment with cosmos-sdk v0.53.x, as v0.47.x will soon reach end-of-life. 

## Change log

- Full changelog [here](https://github.com/persistenceOne/persistenceCore/compare/v12.0.1...v13.0.0).

## How to upgrade

[Upgrade using cosmovisor](https://docs.persistence.one/build/nodes-and-endpoints/node-operations/cosmovisor-upgrades)
[Upgrade manually](https://docs.persistence.one/build/nodes-and-endpoints/node-operations/manual-upgrades)

## Communications

Operators are encouraged to join the `#validators-discussion` channel of the Persistence Community Discord. This channel is the primary communication tool for operators to ask questions, report upgrade status, report technical issues, and build social consensus should the need arise. If you don't have access, please contact someone from the Persistence team directly.
